Articles.Content: I USED TO PLAY KSP LIKE 7 YEARS AGO AND DECIDED TRY IT AGAIN NAD IT HAS BEEN CRASHING ALL OF A SUDDEN FOR NO REASON AT ALL, I HAVE A 980TI 16GB OF RAM AND A RYZEN 5 3600 I DONT THINK IT MATTER ANWAY BECAUSE OF THE GAME.
I have not experienced what you are describing but I have moved your question to the support sub where someone else might have advice.  Good luck and welcome to the forum.

Hi Chatolpv, I'm assuming your referring to ksp1?  A good place to start is verify your files. Are you running any mods? If so remove and retry after verification again.

Check temps on CPU and GPU.

If all good and assuming you have the latest drivers / updates for your system, run checkdisk for errors on that particular drive, download and run malwarebytes and scan for malicious software. If all above is good run command prompt under administrator and type fsc/scannow and run. If there are errors click repair. If it says some errors couldn't be fixed, type DISM/Online/Cleanup-Image/Restorehealth

Can take a while to complete but should fix any errors within windows.

Hope this helps
